comments.author: Kshira
comments.content:
Have you tried using rock salt? My mother uses it in traditional raitas and salads. It does have a pungent smell but adds some good flavor to the raita!
And thanks for the recipe. The radish is an interesting touch!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Interesting! When you say rock salt, do you mean one of the black salts with sulfur in them?

comments.author: Kshira
comments.content: Yes,  you are right. It's the black salt with sulfur(hence the pungent smell)

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Oh, I love that stuff. I'd put it on everything, but my family objects!
